Name: Cu Chulainn
Equipment_Options: This model is equipped with The Cu’s Blade.

Unit_Abilities.Ability_Effect: Any attack that targets this model is treated as having a Rend Characteristic of 0.

When this model completes a charge, you may choose to unleash the Fury of the Cu, if you do, this model suffers 2 Ethereal Damage but immediately makes 4 Attacks with The Cu’s Blade adding the Devastating ability to the weapon until the end of the Step. In addition, this model can Dash and Charge in the same turn.
When this model is slain, before removing it from the field, this model may make melee attacks as if it were the Melee Combat Step.
